name: Customer Agreements Report
query:
select
ca.customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:100",
cus.prersonal_code as "Personal Code::100",
ca.name as "Agreement Number:Link/Customer Agreement:150",
ca.agreement_status as "Agreement Status::150",
ca.date as "Agreement Start Date::180",
ca.product_category as "Product category::150",
ca.monthly_rental_payment as "Rental Payment::150",
ca.agreement_period as "Agreement Period::150",
ca.s90d_sac_price as "90d SAC Price::170",
item.purchase_price_with_vat as"Purchase price::150",
(ca.s90d_sac_price - item.purchase_price_with_vat)/item.purchase_price_with_vat * 100 as "90d SAC profit::180",
(ca.monthly_rental_payment * ca.agreement_period -item.purchase_price_with_vat)/item.purchase_price_with_vat * 100 as "Planned agreement profit::200",
ca.monthly_rental_payment * ca.agreement_period as "Planned agreement incomes::200",
ca.payments_made as "Real agreement incomes::200",
case when ca.agreement_status = "Closed" then ca.agreement_close_date
when ca.agreement_status = "Suspended" then ca.suspended_from
else "-" end as "Agreement closing/suspension date::230",
ca.agreement_closing_suspending_reason as "Agreement closing suspension reason::230",
ca.agreement_period - ca.payments_left as "Active agreement months::180",
ca.payments_made - item.purchase_price_with_vat as "Real agreement profit (EUR)::180",
(ca.payments_made - item.purchase_price_with_vat)/item.purchase_price_with_vat * 100 as "Real agreement profit::180",
ca.payments_left as "Remaining months till the end of agreement::250"
from `tabCustomer Agreement` ca ,`tabCustomer` cus,`tabItem` item
where ca.customer = cus.name and ca.product = item.name
